duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist the CHI Quality Systems Manager with logistical functions associated with the daily operations of the CHI quality System.
Coordinate and communicate key quality metrics monthly.
Maintain audit reports and follow-up about audit observations from customer, corporate, certification, and regulatory audits.
Maintain raw material and finished good assessments and updates specifications to match current requirements.
Coordinate Quality Agreements and questionnaires with suppliers.
Maintain several document and informational databases by organizing and updating information and documentation when necessary; follow up with external parties when necessary.
Support the development of new and the improvement of existing databases.
Assist in annual certification renewals and follow-ups including tracking costs and requesting purchase orders.
Assist in the creation of slide decks for presentations which may include the collection of data.
Must be able to work remotely primarily as well as in-person when necessary (minimal).
